## ModuleWithRoles.revokeAllRolesFromAddress() method

Call this to revoke all roles given to a specific address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
revokeAllRolesFromAddress(address: string): Promise<Role[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | The address to revoke all roles for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Role](./sdk.role.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

A list of roles that were revoked.
